name: Mrs. Fotherbert's Homemade Automata For Domestic And Industrial Use
name_original: Mrs. Fotherbert's Homemade Automata For Domestic And Industrial Use
description:
Mrs. Fotherbert's Homemade Automata For Domestic And Industrial Use is a puzzle game developed by are_euclidean_me. It was originally released in 2022.
Mrs. Fotherbert's Homemade Automata For Domestic And Industrial Use is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
